pr_title: Making cli_ipc_info readable only for the owner

timeline.message: Making cli_ipc_info readable only for the owner

timeline.bodyText: Can you explain why this would fix it? Have you verified?
timeline.author: fengwang666

replies.bodyText: Yes I have verified. By default the read permissions are given for owner, group and other. This first sets the read permissions to false for all then sets it only for owner.
replies.author: abanthiy
